name: Triggerheart Exelica (2007)
description: Triggerheart Exelica (トリガーハート エグゼリカ, Torigā Hāto Eguzerika) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up developed by Warashi for the Sega NAOMI platform. The game was first released in Japanese arcades in May 2006, and was later ported to the Sega Dreamcast, becoming the system's penultimate licensed title when it was released in Japan on February 22, 2007—only two weeks prior to Karous.
